name: Brick Torture
description:
BRICK TORTURE

- This is a game made for the Global Game Jam 2023 -

Going back to one of the roots of video games

Brick breaker! That's what this game is all about. It's a kind of brick breaker. You know... A game about breaking bricks with balls. Yup. Nothing more. Or is it?

It's absolutely a brick breaker

Seriously, it's a brick breaker.

Yup!

That's it.

CONTROLS

ZQSD / WASD / ARROWS - Move

Spacebar - Surprise

IT'S A BRICK BREAKER CREDITS

AUDIO / MUSIC / GRAPHICS : Thomas Lebrun (Raivk)

DEVELOPER : Jean Christophe Joubier (eFrag)

I'M A USELESS PIECE OF TEXT!
